    #

    def get_problem(self):
        cursor = self.db.cursor(MySQLdb.cursors.DictCursor)
        cursor.execute("SELECT * FROM problem WHERE id={id};".format(id=self.packet['id']))
        self.record = cursor.fetchall()[0]
        cursor.close()
        return
